REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1602 reute r f BC-CREDIT-LYONNAIS-<CRLP 04-02 0060

TEXT.TITLE: CREDIT LYONNAIS <CRLP.PA> 1986 PROFIT UP SHARPLY
TEXT.BODY: Parent company net profit 965 mln francs vs 442 mln. Dividend 22.50 francs vs 6.32. Net banking income 22.23 billion francs vs 20.33 billion. Net operating provisions 5.50 billion francs vs 5.19 billion, with most of increase going to cover loans to heavily-indebted countries. Reuter
